thread.title: Today Is The Final Day To Enter The Travvy Awards
thread.title_full: Today Is The Final Day To Enter The Travvy Awards

title: Today Is The Final Day To Enter The Travvy Awards
text:
Last updated: 11:00 PM ET, Thu July 30 2015 Today Is The Final Day To Enter The Travvy Awards 
There is only one full day left to enter our second annual Travvy Awards. The deadline for entries is tonight, 11:59 p.m. ET Friday, July 31. YOU MAY ALSO LIKE Where the Wild Oats Are James Ruggia 
This is your last chance to cast your entries in over 375 categories to put yourself in the running alongside hundreds of suppliers, destinations and even travel professionals who want to be considered the best of the best in travel.On Monday, Mark Murphy, founder/CEO of travAlliancemedia wrote a column that illustrated why suppliers and destinations should enter to win a Travvy. In addition to the unparalleled media exposure that comes with a Travvy win, you’ll be able to leverage that win in your 2016 marketing and public relations efforts – letting travel agents and millions of customers know why you were voted one of the best in travel. 
But, you can’t win if you don’t enter! Chances are your competitors probably already have. We have hundreds of entries across hundreds of categories and in just a few short weeks travel agents will start voting to choose who they believe is the best. The question is – will you be there? 
We’re also getting ready to make an exciting announcement about our 2016 Travvy Gala, taking place Jan. 6, 2016 in New York City. This year we’re doing things a bit differently – announcing the Travvy winners live at the gala. It’s going to be a night to remember! Be on the lookout because ticket sales will begin soon! 
Entering is easy and takes only minutes. Simply visit www.TravvyAwards.com and in a few paragraphs talk about what makes you the best of the best and why you deserve to win a Travvy this year. 
But hurry; there is only one day left to enter. Don’t miss out on being a part of our very exciting 2016 awards season. 
Questions? Need help in determining which category and/or awards you might be a good fit for? Contact me at clove@travalliance.com or at 856-505-1409.
